channel.title: cms on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in cms on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 69: The Umbraco CMS and Community
item.description: In this group episode, I was joined by Carl Sargunar, Lotte Pitcher, Carole Rennie Logan, and Callum Whyte, to discuss the Umbraco community and CMS! We chatted about the amazing community around Umbraco, as well as the features of the CMS itself. It definitely made me want to reach for Umbraco next time I need a CMS! Guest bios Carl Sargunar is an independent web and mobile application developer and technical consultant.

item.title: Episode 12: Kentico Kontent Headless CMS and JAMStack - with Matt Nield
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by good friend Matt Nield, who also co-runs the .NET Oxford user group with me. We chatted about the Kentico Kontent headless CMS, static websites and the JAMStack - plus much more! Links from the show Matt’s links Matt’s website Matt on Twitter Kentico Kentico main website Kentico Kontent Kentico Xperience (previously Kentico EMS): Kentico Kontent extended 3-month trial offer from Matt Other links from the show JAMStack HttpClient Interceptor LINQPad Matt’s YouTube video on using Kentico Kontent with LINQPad Statiq .
